title: Interpretation of provisions relating to prospectuses.
content: 46. For the purposes of the foregoing provisions of this Part- (a) a statement included in a prospectus shall be deemed to be untrue if it is misleading in the form and context in which it is included; and (b) a statement shall be deemed to be included in a prospectus if it is contained therein or in any report or memorandum appearing on the face thereof or by reference incorporated therein or issued therewith. Non- application of sections 38 to 46 of the Law. 6 of 99(I) of 2009. 114(I) of 2005. 200(I) of 2004.
